section.name: Portal Connector installation as System Application

ul.li: In YOUR_SERVERNAME_FOLDER/bin make copy of Example.ilc file
Rename it to XpertIvyServer.ilc or XpertIvyServerService.ilc if server running as service
Find line "#ivy.vm.additional.options=" and replace it by "ivy.vm.additional.options=-Dch.ivyteam.ivy.server.rescanApplications=true"

section.p: With this new parameter server will always check folder with system applications.

ul.li: Export Portal Connector from workspace as .zip file
On server extract all files from .zip to YOUR_SERVERNAME_FOLDER/applications/System/PortalConnector/1/

section.name: Global Variables
section.p: It is not so easy to set a global variable by System application. You have 2 possibilities:
1. Change it direct in system database (IWA_GLOBALVARIABLE)

ul.li: download it from server from folder YOUR_SERVERNAME_FOLDER/applications/System/Administration
change RIA panel ApplicationList - set visible = true for showSystemCheckbox
start administration, set checkbox "Show system applications" to true and you can edit global variables normally (see Pic. 1)

tr.td: Allowed to acces Admin UI of Portal Kit
